message.body: Quick question- I think the A/C in the ##### is busted. Any idea where I should take this to get fixed? Is it a "dealer" issue?
Worth having a local shop check first in case it's just a fuse or something stupid!
Do u think the ######## guys could take a look?
They could rule out simple stuff probably, and at least advise you as to whether it's a dealer issue!
OK. Thanks. I need to take it in for an inspection anyway so I'll ask them about the AC too.
